alert.note: Alert for Bracken; Campbell; Kenton; Mason; Pendleton (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 28 at 4:59PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...SNOW SHOWERS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHWESTERN MASON, KENTON, NORTHERN BRACKEN, CAMPBELL, NORTHERN PENDLETON, EASTERN HAMILTON, CLERMONT, BROWN, WESTERN ADAMS AND SOUTHWESTERN HIGHLAND COUNTIES THROUGH 600 PM EST... At 457 PM EST, snow showers were located along a line extending from 6 miles south of Blanchester to Park Hills, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Significantly reduced visibility and an inch per hour of snow accumulation. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Driving conditions will be negatively impacted, particularly due to the reduced visibility in this heavy snowfall. Slick roads are possible. Locations impacted include... Cincinnati, Covington, Independence, Norwood, Erlanger, Fort Thomas, Newport, Blue Ash, Loveland, Reading, Montgomery, Maysville, Madeira, Edgewood, Alexandria, Fort Mitchell, Villa Hills, Highland Heights, Milford and Taylor Mill. This includes the following Interstates... I-71 in Ohio between mile markers 0 and 16. I-74 in Ohio near mile marker 19. I-75 in Kentucky between mile markers 185 and 191. I-75 in Ohio between mile markers 0 and 12.
info.instruction: Exercise extra caution while traveling. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
